This game still holds up in 2018, still a shame that my laptop with a Geforce GTX 850M cant play it without dropping frames!

Good for:
-Any fps fan
-Anyone that likes a big variety of servers
-Anyone that likes guns
-Anyone that likes skins
-Anyone!

Bad for:
-No one!

The only negative thing i could say, is that servers are slowly dying out, its not often you will find a full zombie escape server anymore, most people have moved to CSGO for that.

Seriously, get it.

One of the top shooters in the world. This game doesnt reward you for killing someone. It doesnt even give the player incentive to win, but the players choose to because its that damn fun. This game pits you against players who have been playing for years, if you want to survive, get your head out of your butt and start learning from your mistakes. Aim for the head, double tap, smart grenades, footsteps, all these tactics will help you become better in pubs, so that one day you can join a team and frag some losers (fragmasters reference). But most importantly do muscle memory training and you will be pro.
Classic First Person Shooter that started it all for me!
Overall one of the best games I've ever played, If you don't have it your honestly dumb.
